Package by.epam.store.model.dao

Interface ProductDao

All Superinterfaces:
BaseDao<Product>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ProductDaoImpl
public interface ProductDao
extends BaseDao<Product>
The interface for working with database table products

    • findProductsInStock

      ProductList findProductsInStock​(int startPosition, int recordsPerPages) throws DaoException
      Looking for products in stock
      Parameters:
      startPosition - start position product in database
      recordsPerPages - quantity of getting products
      Returns:
      ProductList getting products and information for pagination
